Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Enacts the vicarious liability for housing discrimination act of 2025
Summary: Enacts the "vicarious liability for housing discrimination act"; imposes vicarious liability on a person for unlawful discriminatory practices related to the sale, rental, or lease of certain property by such person's agent.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to enacting the "vicarious liability for housing discrimination act of 2025"
